data.meta_title: Get In Contact With Face & Figure Beauty Salon, Taunton Somerset
data.meta_description: Face and Figure Salon Taunton realise that no matter how good a treatment is, a visit to a Beauty Therapist can fall short of a pleasant experience unless you, the client, are treated with courtesy and respect.

content.text: Respect is key to the business

Face  and Figure Salon Taunton realise that no matter how good a treatment  is, a visit to a Beauty Therapist can fall short of a pleasant  experience unless you, the client, are treated with courtesy and  respect.
At Face and Figure  salon Taunton, we have invested heavily in the latest technology and  some treatments are exclusive to us in this area.

We also aim to create a private, friendly, and caring  atmosphere. We now consider many of our clients to be my friends. Even  after 25+ years in the in the business, we are still very enthusiastic  about beauty.

Just fill in this form below and we will get back in  contact with you as soon as possible. We take you privacy very  seriously, therefore no information you disclose in this form will go  further yourself and Face and Figure Salon.

contact_details.alt: Contact us by phone or e-mail

contact_success_msg.text: Thank you for contacting Face & Figure Salon, we will get back to you as soon as possible.

footer_site_date.text: 2022 - Face & Figure Beauty Salon | Taunton, Somerset

footer_links.text: Face & Figure Salon prides itself on selling the very best skincare treatments & services including:
